input.sentences: my family and friends gathered for a dinner .
we had made gravy for the turkey .
my dad was carving it up .
we were all very excited to eat the food .
output.sentences: The friends were going out for a cooking class together.
The cooking class was very crowded.
During the class, they learned to make syrup.
They also made a main dish of chicken.
Making the main dish took a lot of focus.
